name: Duke Freedom
description:
Duke Freedom... a mild mannered Barista, Yoga Instructor, and Life Coach, by day, is a battled hardened mercenary, secretly on hire with the U.S. Government to track down "Evil Doers" and bring them to justice.

Evil Doers within the G.O.P. have dognapped Sunny Obama, the First Dog of the Obama Presidency, with the evil intention of creating Evil Doer Robots, controlled by High Ranking Canines.

It's up to you, Duke Freedom, to penetrate the G.O.P's Secret Underground Bunker, save Sunny Obama, and destroy the Evil Doers secret base.

***

Ok, I thought I'd have a little fun with the political state of the union. This is my first game for the PC and my first on this scale. Most of what I learned came from YouTube and most of those videos were from the "Jimmy Vegas" channel. This game is free and if the feedback is positive enough, then I'll consider continuing with the adventures of Duke Freedom.
